name: Leave Me Alone! (Cavlar)
description:
Use the blue fullscreen button for proper fullscreen.

A game with the theme "Leave Me Alone", created in three hours for Trijam 152.

This 2D platformer is made harder by a single enemy that copies your every move, forcing you to be constantly on your feet. A full version may be released soon :)

Use A and D or arrow keys to move, and SPACE to jump.
